src_original: namaḥ śrī-āryyamaitrīya pramukhabhyo mahābodhisatvebhyaḥ namaḥ supratiṣṭhite (152)
śairendrarāja pramukhebhyaḥ sarvatatha-āgatebhyo'hatasamyakkaṁ buddhebhyo bhagavatebhyaḥ ||  namaḥ sūvarṇṇavaṇa-arṇaprabhāviteśvara rājāya tathāgatāya |  namaḥ sihaṁvikriditarājāya tathāgatāya ||
namaḥ supratiṣṭhitaṁ maṇikūṭarojāyatathāgatāya ||  namaḥ samantara ścuṅataśrīka-tarājāyatathāgatāya |
